1255:7: tathā hi sa evāyaṃ ghaṭasphaṭikādiriti pratyabhijñākhyaṃ pratyakṣamudīyamānaṃ sthairyamutthāpayati |
1255:14: mithyātvaṃ hi tadviṣaye bādhakapratyayād vā hetūtthadoṣato vā saṃbhāvyeta |
1255:17: na cānavagatāpi bādhā kadācidapi bhaviṣyatīti śaṅkā yuktimatī,
1255:20: iti dattāvakāśā saṃśayapiśācī labdhaprasarā na kvacinnāstīti nāyaṃ kvacitpravarteta |
1255:37: nanu pratyakṣe'pi bādhake kasmānna bhavati parasparapratibandhena dvayorapyapratyakṣatā |
1255:39: arthakriyāsamarthavastuviṣayāviṣayatvena samānatvābhāvādekasya pratyakṣābhāsatvāditi na sadviṣayatvaṃ bādhakapratyayānmithyātvam |
1255:45: na hi tadevedaṃ syād vā na veti sphaṭikādiṣūdayati matiḥ,
1255:49: yadeva hi utpannamasandigdhamaduṣṭakāraṇajanyaṃ deśakālanarāntareṣvabādhitaṃ ca tadeva pramāṇamiti naḥ siddhāntaḥ | taduktam
1255:55: iti | etacca lakṣaṇamuktanyāyena pratyabhijñāne'pi saṃbhavatīti pramāṇamevedam |
1255:63: tathā satyapi sphaṭikaḥ sphaṭika iti vyapadeśābhede pūrvadeśakālasaṃbandhāparadeśakālasaṃbandhābhyāṃ viaruddhadharmābhyāṃ yogāt sphaṭikaḥ pūrvāparakālayorbhidyata iti viṣayabhedo vaktavyaḥ |
1255:66: na cānayoḥ svabhāvaviruddhayordahanatuhinayoriva śakyā śakreṇāpyekatā āpādayitum,
1255:71: tasmāt pratyabhijñā ekatvaṃ sthāpayati bhāvānāmiti manorathamātram ||
1255:77: na hi nājījanad bījamātramaṅkuramiti mṛdādisahitamapi na janayati |
1255:90: na khalvetadapi vijñānaṃ tattedantādhikaraṇamekamābhyāmanuraktaṃ sphaṭikaṃ gocarayadabhinnaṃ nānubhūyate nāvasīyate vā |
1255:94: na ca sa iti pūrvadeśakālasaṃsargo'yamiti ca sannihitadeśakālasaṃsargaṃ ekasya virudhyate,
1255:95: yato yuktaṃ yatpadmarāgasya svarūpe paricchidyamāne tadabhāvo vyavacchidyata iti tadavyavacchede tatsvarūpāparicchedāt svapracyutivyavacchedyasvabhāvatvāt padmarāgabhāvasya tadanavacchede tatparicchedānupapatteḥ ||
1255:102: samasti ca so'yaṃ padmarāga iti deśakālāvasthānugatamekaṃ padmarāgamavabhāsayantī sākṣātkāravatī pratītiḥ |
1255:107: atha keśakuśakadalīstambādau satyapi bhede pratyabhijñānamutpannamiti cet |
1255:115: anumānatve'pyabādhitatvāditi viśeṣaṇe na doṣa iti pratipādayiṣyāmaḥ |
1255:119: saṃśayamātraṃ tu vyavahārocchedakatvānnāśrayaṇīyamevati pratipāditamiti na tṛtīyo'pio pakṣaḥ ||
1255:120: kiṃ ca keśādau yadi pratyabhijñā vyabhicāriṇo,
1255:122: yā vyabhicāriṇo sā kāryakāraṇapratītireva na bhavatīti cet |
1255:123: yadyevaṃ yā visaṃvādinī sā pratyabhijñaiva na bhavati tadābhāsatvāditi samānam |
1255:127: tadiyaṃ pratyabhijñā anekadeśakālāvasthāsaṃbaddhamekaṃ sphaṭikādikaṃ gocarayantī sthairyaṃ vyavasthāpayati ||
1255:129: prayogaḥ - vivādādhyāsitaḥ sa evāyaṃ sphaṭikaṃ ityādipratyabhijñāpratyayo yathārthaḥ,
1255:140: yathā yastvayā dṛṣṭo nīlo'rthaḥ sa eva mayā dṛṣṭa iti nīlo'rthaḥ pratyabhijñāyate |
1255:146: prayogaḥ -vivādāspadībhūtā bhāvā yathāsvaṃ vināśahetusannidheḥ prāṅ na vināśinaḥ,
1255:152: sahetukavināśatvaṃ ca ghaṭasyāgnidhūmayoriva pratyakṣānupalambhato mudgaravināśayorapi kāryakāraṇabhāvasiddhau siddham |
1255:163: kāraṇavattvasya sādhyaviparyaye vṛttiśaṅkā vināśasya sahetukatvameva nivartayatīti prasiddhavyāptikāt kāraṇavattvādakṣaṇikatvasiddhiriti ||
1255:183: tadaiva bhāvo'sti na pūrvaṃ na praścādityapi śabdaḥ kṣaṇikaparyāyatveneṣyamāṇaḥ kṣaṇādūrdhvaṃ sattvāvicchedopajananamantareṇa nārthavān devairapi śakyaḥ parikalpayitum |
1255:189: nivṛttiparityāge ca janmino bhāvā nityā iti durnivāraḥ prasaṅgaḥ |
1255:193: yasmādarthaṃ kañcit prāpayat pratyakṣaṃ tena pratyāsannatvātprāpayati |
1255:198: sā ca niyatavastupratibhāsākṣiptā kāryakāraṇabhāvalakṣaṇā pratyāsattistulyakālaṃ pramāṇaprameyayoranupapannā,
1255:203: pūrvakālasattvaṃ ca kṣaṇikatve'nupapannamiti vyāpakānupalabdhyā vipakṣāt kṣaṇikatvād vyāvartamānaṃ prameyatvamakṣaṇikatvena vyāpyata iti asandigdho vyatirekaḥ |
1255:206: tathā hi kāryakāraṇabhāvagrahaṇaṃ kramayaugapadyagrahaṇasmaraṇam abhilāṣaḥ svayaṃnihitapratyanumārgaṇaṃ duṣṭārthakutūhalaviramaṇaṃ karmaphalasaṃbandhaḥ saṃśayapūrvakanirṇayaḥ bandhamokṣaḥ mokṣaprayatnaḥ śubhodarke karmaṇi pravṛttiḥ pratyabhijñā kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ upādānopādeyabhāvaprabhṛtayaḥ sthirasattāmantareṇānupapadyamānāḥ sthairya sādhayanti |
1255:207: pratikṣaṇaṃ bhede satyanubhaviturvinaṣṭatve'nyasya kāryakāraṇabhāvagrahaṇādyanupapatteriti kathaṃ kṣaṇabhaṅgaśaṅkāpi ||
1255:209: apramāṇamevāyaṃ pratyabhijñākhyo vikalpo mithyātvaṃ ca sadviṣayatvabādhakapratyayāt |
1255:215: tathā hi māyākāraḥ śirasi nimajjitaṃ golakamāsyena niḥsārayatīti pratyabhijñā śirasi cchidraprasaṅgasaṅgatenānumānena bādhyamānā pratītaiva |
1255:217: yathāvanatākāśapratibhāsaḥ sarvasaṃpratipattāvapi bādhya eva tadvadekatāgrahaḥ sarvasaṃpratipattāvapi bādhyo'stu |
1255:224: nanūktaṃ yā vyabhicāriṇī sā na pratyabhijñetyādi |
1255:228: tathā yadi pratyabhijñāne'pi lakṣaṇabhedo darśitaḥ syāt,
1255:235: aliṅgasya hi vikalpasya saṃvādo nāma pramāṇāntarasaṅgatirarthakriyāprāptirvā |
1255:241: tathā hi yathaiko ghaṭo vāri dhārayatīti tatkālabhāvino'pyanyasya deśāntaravartino na vāridhāraṇavāraṇam tathā dvitīyādikṣaṇopyanyo yadi vāri dhārayati,
1255:245: nanu yadyekaṃ pratyabhijñānaṃ bisaṃvādi dṛṣṭamiti sarvameva pratyabhijñānaṃ visaṃvādi śaṅkyate,
1255:246: tadaikamindriyajñānaṃ keśoṇḍukadvicandrādau visaṃvādyupalabdhamiti ghaṭādiṣvapi sarvameva pratyakṣaṃ visaṃvādi saṃbhāvyatām,
1255:253: dvicandrādau tvarthavinākṛtena timirādiviplutacakṣuirmātreṇa tajjñānaṃ janitamiti pratyakṣābhāsameva |
1255:254: dvicandrādyarthābhāvastu deśakālanarāntarairdvicandrāderarthasya bādhitatvādavyāhata iti pratyakṣābhāsaparihāre'pi pratyakṣeṣu ka āścāsavirodhaḥ |
1255:256: yathā hi pūrvaṃ pāvakādau pākādikriyā pratibaddhā siddhā paścādanubhūyamānā dahanajñānasya saṃvādamāvedayati,
1255:258: na tathā prathamacaramakālayorekīmāvapratibaddhā kācidarthakriyā upalabdhigocarā pūrvāparakālayorekatvamantareṇa vā pravṛttyādikṣatiryenaikatāvagraho'pi saṃvādī syāt |
1255:259: tadiyamanumānabādhitatvād vyabhicāraśaṅkākalaṅkitatvāccana pratyakṣamanumānaṃ veti kathamataḥ sthairyasiddhiranumānapratihatirvā ||
1255:260: yat punarvācaspatirūvāca saṃskārendriyayormilitayoreva pratyabhijñānaṃ prati kāraṇatvamiti,
1255:263: tathā hi nimīlite cakṣuṣi sa ityatrendriyavinākṛtasyaiva saṃskārasya sāmarthyamupalabdham |
1255:267: bījakṣityādyostu pṛthak sāmarthyaṃ na dṛṣṭamityekaiva sāmagrītyaṅkuro'pyeka evāstu |
1255:269: viruddhayordharmayoḥ padmarāgādanyatve'pi viruddhadharmayogāt padmarāgasya bhedaḥ kathamapahnayate,
1255:271: na hi dharmadharmiṇoranyatve'pi brāhmaṇatvacāṇḍālatve ekādhāre bhavitumarhata iti padmarāgasya bhedo duratikramaḥ |
1255:274: anumānasya hi paramārthataḥ svasaṃvedanapratyakṣātmano'vikalpasyāsamāropasvabhāvasyāpratyakṣatvavikalpatvasamāropatvādeḥ parāpekṣayā prajñaptatvād viruddhadharmādhyāsābhāvāt kathaṃ bhedasiddhiḥ |
1255:275: sa e vāyamiti tu pratyabhijñānasya sa ityaspaṣṭākārayogitvam,
1255:277: na caivaṃ vaktavyam tattedantāpekṣayā pratyabhijñānasyāpyekasyaiva pārokṣyāpārokṣyamaviruddhamiti |
1255:280: yāvadatītārthākārānukāro vartamānārthānukāraśca svadharmo na bhavati tāvattadarthagocarataiva nāsti |
1255:284: yatpunaratroktam sahetukavināśatvaṃ ghaṭasyāgnidhūmayoriva pratyakṣānupalambhato mudgaraghaṭavināśayorapi kāryakāraṇabhāvasiddhau siddhamiti,
1255:291: dṛṣṭastāvadayaṃ ghaṭo'tra ca patan dṛṣṭastathā mudgaro
1255:292: dṛṣṭā karparasaṃhatiḥ paramato nāśo na dṛṣṭaḥ paraḥ |
1255:293: tenābhāva iti śrutiḥ kva nihitā kiṃ vātra tatkāraṇaṃ
1255:296: yatpunarasminnadṛśyamāne'pi dṛśyata iti vāgjālaṃ sā bhaṇḍavidyā |
1255:302: tathā ca sati mudgarādyabhāve karparābhāvāt ghaṭasthairyamavyāhatamiti |
1255:304: tathā hi yathā nāśaśabdena karparamucyate tathā yadyabhāvaśabdenāpi karparamevocyate tadaikatra pradeśe ghaṭamekamapanīya ghaṭāntaranyāse tatrāpanītaghaṭasyābhāvavyavahāro na syāt,
1255:306: tasmādyathāpanītaghaṭasya pracyutimātrāpekṣayā nyastaghaṭe'bhāvavyavahārastathā mudgarādikāraṇābhāvāt pradhvaṃsakarparayoranutpāde'pi pracyutimātrāpekṣayaiva pratikṣaṇamanyānyatvavyavahāro ghaṭasya sidhyatīti kutaḥ sthairyasiddhiḥ |
1255:309: āstāṃ karparapaṃktireva kalaśadhvaṃso na ceyaṃ purā
1255:310: tena sthairyamapi prasidhyatu tato bhinnena nāśena kim |
1255:312: nāśaḥ saiva yathocyate yadi tathābhāvo'pi kumbhāntara-
1255:316: kathaṃ kvacideva deśe kāle ghaṭo naṣṭa iti pratītiniyamaḥ |
1255:319: nāśo nāsti yadi svahetuniyataḥ kiṃ deśakāle kvacit
1255:320: kumbho naṣṭa iti pratītiniyamastenāsti kāryaśca saḥ |
1255:322: nāśoktā na kṛtā vinaṣṭaghaṭadhīḥ kenoddhurā vāryate ||
1255:323: iti cet | tarhīdānīmarthāpattyā pradhvaṃsaṃ prasādhya mudgarādhīnatvamasya sādhayitumārabdham |
1255:324: tathā ca sati dhūmāgnivat pratyakṣataḥ pradhvaṃsasya mudgarādikāryatvaṃ siddhamityutphullagallamullapitaṃ vyāluptam ||
1255:327: vināśaṃ vināpi hi ghaṭadarśanavato mudgarakṛtakapālānubhava evanaṣṭaghaṭāvasāyasādhanaḥ,
1255:331: mudgarābhāve karparapaṃkterevābhāvāt kathaṃ prāgapi naṣṭaghaṭabuddhiprasaṅgaḥ saṃgato nāma |
1255:335: sāmagryāmiha nāśanāma na kimapyaṅgaṃ na cāsyāmapi
1255:336: syādeṣā na kadāpi nāpi ca purāpyeṣā samagrā sthitiḥ ||
1255:337: arthāpattirato gatā kṣayamiyaṃ na dhvaṃsasiddhau prabhuḥ || iti ||
1255:338: yadi nāśānubhavo nāsti kapālānubhavāt kapālakalpanaiva syāt,
1255:347: ucyate | na cāvidyamānamadṛśyaṃ vā svabuddhyā kiñcidrañjayati |
1255:348: prayogo'trayasya na svarūpanirbhāsastanna kasyacit svānurakta pratītinimittam |
1255:358: na dhvaṃsena vinā vinaśyati jagad bhāvena sārdhaṃ sacet
1255:367: tadā kaḥ punarbhāvasya pradveṣo yena pradhvaṃsākhye vastuni svahetorutpanne nivartate nāma ||
1255:371: atra svabhāvabhedairuttaraṃ vācyam ye parasparaparihārasthitayaḥ svahetubhyo jāyante |
1255:372: na hi svato'nyasyāṅkurasya vahnirna kāraṇamityanyatvāviśeṣād bhasmano'pi na kāraṇam |
1255:374: yathā cotpādasya purastādakhilasāmarthyarahitasyāṅkuraprāgabhāvasyāpakāraṃ kañcidakurvanto'pi bījādayo'ṅkuramārabhamāṇāḥ prāgabhāvaṃ nivartayanti,
1255:379: taducitaṃ syād yadi kāryakāraṇayorivāsyā pyātmā pramāṇapratītaḥ syāt ,
1255:381: arthāpattirapi kṣīṇetyapi prāgabhāvasya ca dṛṣṭāntatvenopanyāso bhaṇḍālekhyanyāyaḥ |
1255:385: sa ca dhvaṃso dhvaṃsāntaramupanayan saṃprati bhaved
1255:386: virodhī so'pyanyaṃ kṣayamiti na nāśaḥ kathamapi ||
1255:387: anyathā siddhasattāmātreṇa virodhitve sarvaṃ sarveṇa viruddhaṃ prasajyeta |
1255:393: saccāsacca kimastu vastviti tu prasaṅgaḥ trilocanaprastāve nirākaraṇīyaḥ |
1255:394: ata evātra prastāve bhuvanaikagurūn bhagavataḥ kīrtipādānavamanyamānaḥ śaṅkaraḥ paśorapipaśuriti kṛpāpātramevaiṣa jālmaḥ |
1255:396: yā hi tasya prāktanī kācidavasthā bhavadbhirarthakriyānirvartanayogyā dṛṣṭā saiva yadyuttarakālamapyanuvartate tarhi svarūpeṇaiva nivṛtto bhāvaḥ kathamavasthāpyate |
1255:397: tadānīmayaṃ naṣṭo nāma yadi svahetupratilabdhasvarūpavyatirekiṇī tasya kācidavasthotpadyeta,
1255:398: utpattau saiva tasyātmāntaraṃ jātamityatādavasthyamevāsya vināśaṃ brūmaḥ |
1255:399: tādavasthye tādātmye ca svarūpeṇa nivṛtto bhāva ityasya śabdasya satyamarthaṃ na vidmaḥ |
1255:400: svarūpanivṛttiḥ khalviyaṃ bhavantī bhāva eva syāt,
1255:415: yathā hi deśāntaraparāvṛttamanīlādiparāvṛttaṃ ca svahetorutpannaṃ vastu tathā dvitīyakṣaṇāntaraparāvṛttamapi |
1255:417: viruddhaṃ ca deśāntarāvasthāyitvenaiva tathā dvitīyakṣaṇāvasthāyitvaṃ prathamakṣaṇāvasthāyitvenāviruddham,
1255:424: paramārthatastu dharmidharmayostādātmyaṃ vyāvṛttikṛto bhedavyavahāra iti apohasiddhau prasādhitam |
1255:426: etāvati tu tattve vākchalamātrapravṛttā dveṣaviṣajvalitātmānaḥ kṣudrāḥ pralapantīti kimatra brūmaḥ |
1255:427: tataśca vyatiriktanivṛttyutpattimantareṇa svarūpanivṛtterupapatteḥ kathaṃ kṣaṇādūrdhvaṃ prāktanasattāvasthitiḥ |
1255:432: na, tadanutpattimātraviṣayasya vācāniścayena ca paścādabhāvavyavahāramātrapravartanasyeṣṭatvād vastūtpattereva niṣiddhatvāt |
1255:436: abhāvaśca mithyeti bhāva eva pratiṣedhyasya syāt |
1255:443: na ca vastvantare pratipādite pratīte vā ghaṭādi vastubhūtamiti pratipāditaṃ pratītaṃ vā bhavati |
1255:444: evaṃ vastvantarameva nāśa iti asmin mate yad dūṣaṇamuktaṃ tat svayameva parihṛtaṃ syāditi,
1255:446: kevalaṃ hi bhūtalamasya viṣaya iti kathaṃ na ghaṭāderabhūtatvabodhaḥ |
1255:447: yaiva hi ghaṭādyapekṣayā kaivalyāvasthā pradeśasya sa eva ghaṭavirahaḥ |
1255:450: na ceha ghaṭo nāstīti pratyayasya ghaṭavatyapi pradeśe prasaṅgaḥ,
1255:457: yadi hetornityo'nityo vārtho jātaḥ kiṃ nāśakāraṇeneti hetupuraskāreṇaiva pravṛtteḥ |
1255:465: na kasyacit kutaścid bhedavyavasthitirityadvaitaprasaṅga iti cet |
1255:467: yo hi naśvarasvabhāvaḥ sa eva nāśoḥ,
1255:470: naśanaṃ nāśa iti tu prasajyātmā dvidhā kartavyaḥ |
1255:471: tattvatastāvad vastutvavirahāt tattvānyatvavirahita evāsau bhāvo na bhavatīti tadbhāvaniṣedhamātrapātaṃ tu bhavati kharaśṛṅgādivat |
1255:472: saṃvṛtau tu yathā kālabhedena vikalpyamānaḥ kādācitka iva pratibhāti tathā sarvopākhyāviraharūpatayā bhāvādbhinna iva pratibhātīti nāvastutvopalakṣaṇabhedākhyānavirodhaḥ |
1255:473: evaṃ ca sati saṃvṛttyā lakṣaṇabhede bhāvābhāvayorbhedasyeṣṭatvāt |
1255:474: tatvena ca lakṣaṇaikatāvirahe bhāvasya tenaikyaniṣedhāt kathamadvaitaprasaṅgopālambhaḥ ||
1255:475: syādetat | na ca vivekāpratītau tadviviktagrahaṇaṃ bhavati |
1255:478: viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvo hi saṅkalpāruḍhe rūpe bāhyārthasparśe vikalpaśabdaliṅgāntarāṇāṃ vaiyarthyaprasaṅgāditi śāstre vistareṇa pratipādanāt |
1255:484: abhinne'pi bhāve bhedavivakṣāpekṣo bhedavyavahāraḥ kathaṃ bhedaniyatamātmānamātanotu ||
1255:485: skhaladgatirayaṃ rāhoḥ śira ityādinirdeśa iti cet |
1255:487: tadā śiro'tiriktasya rāhoriva kṣmātalāderatiriktasya vivekasya dṛśyānupalambhabādhitatvādayamapi nirdeśaḥ skhaladgatireva,
1255:489: tasmātsaghaṭāt pradeśāntarāt pradeśa evāyamanyo ghaṭaviviktaḥ svahetorutpanno na tu ghaṭavivekena viśeṣitaḥ,
1255:493: deśo viśiṣṭa iti cāsti yathā tatheda-
1255:496: tadevaṃ sahetukavināśatvāditi hetuḥ svarūpāsiddha iti sthitam ||
1255:500: na cāsya viparyaye vṛttiśaṅkā nāśasya sahetukatvameva nivartayati,
1255:509: tataśca kāraṇatvād yadi nāma prameyatvasya pūrvakālasattvena vyāptistathāpi prameyatvavat pūrvakālasattvamapi kṣaṇike'viruddhamiti prameyatvākṣaṇikatvayorvyāptisādhano vyāpakānupalambho'siddhaḥ |
1255:516: iyaṃ ca pratyāsattiranantarātīte'pi kṣaṇe'kṣīṇeti na dvitīyakṣaṇānuvṛtteranurodha ityuktam |
1255:527: idaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ vedamityadhyavasāyo yatrārthe sa viṣaya iti cet |
1255:531: vyavahāro'pi tvanmate niyato na syāditi brūmaḥ |
1255:538: ādye pakṣe sarvaṃ sarvasya vedanaṃ syāt |
1255:540: kiṃ ca sārūpyādarthavedane'nantaraṃ jñānaṃ tulyaviṣayaṃ viṣayaḥ syāditi cet |
1255:543: ata eva sthūlagataṃ paramāṇugataṃ vā sārūpyaṃ na cintyate |
1255:558: tathā hi upādānopādeyabhāvasthitacittasantatimapyāśrityeyaṃ vyavasthā sustheti kathamātmānaṃ pratyujjīvayatu |
1255:560: tathāpi prāgbhāvivastuniścayajñānasyopādeyabhūtena tadarpitasaṃskāragarbheṇa paścādbhāvivastujñānenāsmin satīdaṃ bhavatīti niścayo janyate |
1255:561: tathā prāgbhāvivastvapekṣayā kevalabhūtalaniścāyakajñānopādeyabhūtena tadarpitasaṃskāragarbheṇa paścādbhāvivastvapekṣayā kevalabhūtalaniścāyakajñānenāsminnasatīdaṃ na bhavatīti vyatirekaniścayo janyate | yathoktam
1255:566: ata eva devadattenāgnau pratīte yajñadattena ca dhūme pratīte na kāryakāraṇabhāvagrahaṇaṃ tajjñānayorupādānopādeyabhāvābhāvāt |
1255:568: anyathā satyapi nityātmani pratisandhātari kāryakāraṇabhāvādīnāmapratītireva syāt |
1255:569: tathā hi ātmanaḥ sakāśāt pratisandheyabuddhīnāmabhedo bhedo vā bhedābhedo vā |
1255:571: buddhya eva vā syuḥ pratisandheyā iti kaḥ pratisandhānārthaḥ |
1255:572: bhedapakṣa'pi buddhibhyo bhidyamānasya jaḍasyātmanaḥ kaḥ pratisandhānārtha iti na vidmaḥ |
1255:574: buddhi reva tarhi draṣṭī pratisandhātrī cetī niyamasvīkāre tadyogādasya tathātvamiti kimanena yācitakamaṇḍanena |
1255:577: yadi hi buddhirhetoḥ phalasya vā draṣṭrī syāt tadānantaryapratiniyamasya cānusandhātrī kalpitā |
1255:578: tadyogād draṣṭṛtvaṃ pratisandhātṛtvaṃ cocyata iti syādapi prativiṣayamalabdhaviśeṣāyāṃ ca buddhau saṃbandho'pi na viśeṣaṃ vyavahārayitumīśaḥ - adhunā nibandhanādhigantā,
1255:586: tathā hi nedamidamantareṇa yaducyate tat khalvanyatra pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ sāmarthyāvadhāraṇe sati yujyate vahneriva dhūme,
1255:587: cakṣurādivadvā dṛṣṭakāraṇāntarasāmagryā kāryādarśane paścād darśane ca kiñcidanyadapekṣaṇīyamastīti sāmānyākāreṇa |
1255:590: na hi kāraṇabuddhisamanantaraṃ kāryabuddhau satyāṃ niścayapravṛttasyedamasyānantaraṃ dṛṣṭaṃ mayeti pratisandhānamadṛṣṭapūrvaṃ kadācit yato'nyasya sāmarthyaparikalpanaṃ syādityudasya vyāmohamuktakrameṇaiva kāryakāraṇagrahaṇavyavasthā svīkartavyā |
1255:593: tataśca yadbhinnaṃ bhinnamevābhinnaṃ cābhinnamiti naikasya bhedābhedau |
1255:595: evaṃ kramivastugrāhakaiḥ kramijñānairupādānopādeyabhūtaiḥ sākṣāt pāramparyeṇa krameṇāmī jāyanta iti niścayo janyate |
1255:596: aikakālikānekavastugrāhakaireva tajjñānairekopādānatvāt sakṛdimāni jātānīti vikalpaḥ kriyata iti kramākramagrahaṇamapyanavadyam |
1255:611: yato hetuphalabhūtayoḥ pūrvottarakṣaṇayorekaikena jñānenānanubhave'pyupādānopādeyabhūtābhyāṃ kramijñānābhyāṃ hetuphalatve gṛhīte eva |
1255:613: tadviṣayasāmarthyagrahaṇe'pi phalādarśanāt tadavasāya evāpravṛttaḥ kāryadarśanena pravartyate |
1255:614: tathā phalāvalokane'pi tatkāryatā gṛhītaiva vikalpenānusandhīyata iti gṛhītānusandhānarūpa evāyaṃ vikalpa iti yatkiñcidetat |
1255:622: saṃśayapūrvakanirṇayaśca pūrvapūrvānubhavaikopādānakāraṇaiḥ samarpitasaṃskāragatairuttarottarārthānubhavaivopādeyabhūtairjanyamāno yujyata iti kimadhikenātmanā parikalpitena |
1255:623: upādānopādeyabhāvaniyamādeva ca na santānāntare smaraṇādiprasaṅgaḥ saṅgataḥ |
1255:627: yathā mṛtsantānanivṛttyotpadyamānasya kumbhasya mṛdupādānamiti śāstre prapañcitam |
1255:629: yadapyuktam - cittaśarīrayoḥ kiyatkālasthitinibandhanasya dṛṣṭasya nivṛttau cittasyāpi nivṛttiprasaṅgaḥ |
1255:638: yataḥ satyapyātmanyahameva mukto bhaviṣyāmi sukhī cetyātmagrahaṇakṣaṇādadhyavasāyāt pravartate |
1255:640: sa cānādyavidyāparamparāyātaḥ pūrvāparayorekatvāropako mithyāsaṅkalpo bādhite'pyātmanyavyāhataprasara iti kathamapravṛttiḥ | nanu
1255:648: yathā hi jātasyāvaśyaṃ mṛtyuriti jñātavatopyapratikriyaputrādimaraṇe sorastāḍamākrando maraṇādau ca yatnaḥ śokodrekāt evamavidyodrekādeva nairātmyaṃ jānannapi pravartate,
1255:654: upādānopādeyatā ca kramisvasaṃvedanajñānadvayena sākṣātkṛtā tatpṛṣṭhabhāvinā niścīyata iti,
1255:655: asatyapyātmani pratisandhātari kāryakāraṇagrahaṇādaya upapadyamānā nātmānamupasthāpayituṃ prabhavanti |
1255:656: ato'rthāpattirati na kṣameti bhāgyahīnamanorājyamiva sthirasiddhirviśīryata eva |
